section.5: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al-Mughirah bin Shu’bah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The Imam should not pray in the place where he offered the obligatory prayer, until he moves aside.” Another chain from Mughirah, from the Prophet (ﷺ) with similar wording
